data.name: Banana Bells
data.description: Iron banana bells for trad-style dunun playing. The favoured style of bell for many dununfola; they sound great and do far less damage to your dunun ropes than most other bells.

data.name: Ksink Ksink
data.description: Percussive djembe decoration for stage performances. Add a little sizzle to your sound and your look.

data.name: Beat Butter - Hand Nourishment
data.description:
100ml tubs of fortified shea butter. All our blends include skin stregthening tincture of benzoin that helps prevent damage and speeds up the healing process when damage does occur.

Our blends include:
Warming Ginger
Fragrance of the Forest
Invigorating Citrus
Relaxing Bergamot
